subscription.title: Membership Subscription
subscription.free_trial_description: Start a 7-day free trial. You'll be automatically subscribed after the trial ends.
subscription.ios_only: This feature is only available on iOS devices
subscription.terms_agreement: By subscribing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
subscription.terms_prefix: By subscribing, you agree to our
subscription.cancel_notice: If you cancel your subscription, you will still have access to premium features until the end of your billing period.
subscription.monthly_description: 7-Day Free Trial, Then by price, Auto-renews by date, cancel anytime
subscription.yearly_description: 7-Day Free Trial, Then $9.99/year, Auto-renews yearly, cancel anytime
subscription.benefit_white_noise_desc: Unlock all premium white noise tracks
subscription.benefit_themes_desc: Unlock all premium themes and colors
subscription.ios_purchase_only: Please use App Store in-app purchase on iOS
subscription.purchase_success_message: Thank you for your support and enjoy all the premium features!

gesture_guide.welcome_description: This is a daily facts app that helps you learn useful knowledge and information for everyday life.
gesture_guide.swipe_description: Swipe up and down to switch between different daily facts and explore more content.
gesture_guide.long_press_description: Long press on a card to view more action options
gesture_guide.play_description: Click the play button to listen to the voice broadcast of the fact content
gesture_guide.favorite_description: Click the heart icon to favorite facts you like

rating.title: Enjoying DailyFacts?
rating.message: Your ratings and feedback are very important to us and help us improve the app experience!
